pr_title: [JENKINS-64445] - Fix null safety for plugin categories

timeline.message: [JENKINS-64445] - Fix null safety for plugin categories

timeline.body: Maybe use a constant for "adopt-this-plugin", since it is used twice here.
timeline.bodyText: Maybe use a constant for "adopt-this-plugin", since it is used twice here.
timeline.bodyHTML: Maybe use a constant for "adopt-this-plugin", since it is used twice here.
timeline.author: StefanSpieker

timeline.body:
```suggestion
         * Can be {@code null} if the update center does not support plugin categories.
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                     * Can be {@code null} in the update center does not support plugin categories.
          
          
            
                     * Can be {@code null} if the update center does not support plugin categories.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* Can be {@code null} in the update center does not support plugin categories.
* Can be {@code null} if the update center does not support plugin categories.
timeline.author: MRamonLeon

timeline.body:
This is wrong, update centers (like CloudBees' ) may support categories, but just don't send an empty list when none are defined for a specific plugin.

This is why I suggested to just change https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/blob/fd0d3170dee4eef71e08f819ffa0bd8745a419ae/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/UpdateSite.java#L1169 in a different channel.
timeline.bodyText:
This is wrong, update centers (like CloudBees' ) may support categories, but just don't send an empty list when none are defined for a specific plugin.
This is why I suggested to just change 
  
    
      jenkins/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/UpdateSite.java
    
    
         Line 1169
      in
      fd0d317
    
    
    
    

        
          
           this.categories = o.has("labels") ? internInPlace((String[])o.getJSONArray("labels").toArray(EMPTY_STRING_ARRAY)) : null; 
        
    
  

 in a different channel.
timeline.bodyHTML:
This is wrong, update centers (like CloudBees' ) may support categories, but just don't send an empty list when none are defined for a specific plugin.

This is why I suggested to just change

jenkins/core/src/main/java/hudson/model/UpdateSite.java

Line 1169 in fd0d317

this.categories = o.has("labels") ? internInPlace((String[])o.getJSONArray("labels").toArray(EMPTY_STRING_ARRAY)) : null;
in a different channel.
timeline.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
I am fine with this change @daniel-beck . I think that new API would not hurt anyway, especially if we want to keep expanding the label management logic
